# Soma Status

This repository contains the status page for [Soma Weather](https://somaweather.com), powered by [Upptime](https://upptime.js.org).

## Status

<!--start: status pages-->
<!-- This summary is generated by Upptime (https://github.com/upptime/upptime) -->

Live status: https://status.somaweather.com

<!--end: status pages-->

## Services Monitored

- **Soma API** - Backend weather API
- **Soma Website** - Marketing website

## How it Works

- Upptime checks each service every 5 minutes
- Results are stored in this repository
- A static status page is generated and deployed to GitHub Pages
- Incidents are automatically created as GitHub Issues
